mapper.delete: delete from t_scene_login_baseline where EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - last_login_time)) / 3600 > #{overtimeHour}

insert into t_scene_login_baseline(dest_address, src_user_name, last_login_time, city_counts, city_array, create_time, update_time) values
(#{item.destAddress},#{item.srcUserName},CAST(#{item.lastLoginTime} AS timestamp),#{item.cityCounts},#{item.cityArray},CAST(#{item.createTime} AS timestamp),CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
on duplicate key update last_login_time=VALUES(last_login_time), city_counts=VALUES(city_counts), city_array=VALUES(city_array), update_time=VALUES(update_time), create_time=create_time
